name: Under Cover of Night
description:
After waking up in a strange place, you find that the world is covered in eternal darkness. Evil cylinders run amok, and it is your job to stop them.

This game was made for a 48-hour game jam at school - as such, it is merely a shell of what it could be. I used this game as more of a test environment to get basic mechanics such as combat and enemy AI working to some capacity.
